title: [Sponsor] Tom Bihn's Synik 22
content:
It’s the pack you’ve been waiting for: suspended laptop compartment that fits most 13-inch laptops, rolling luggage pass-through, ultra-comfortable Edgeless shoulder straps, and full clamshell opening. Cut and sewn in Seattle. Lifetime Guarantee.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
